original_title: Suronin Makari Toru 4 Sarumo Jigoku Nokorumo Jigoku
overview: The "lowly ronin" meets a child who is being chased bymen that killed his father before his eyes. Feeling indebted to the child for buying him dinner, the Ronin takes the child back to his village. There, the Ronin reluctantly gets involved in a pathetic revolt by the cowardly villagers against their tyrannical governor. Mifune at his best!
title: Lowly Ronin 4: Living Hell
